titles.title: Community Postal Service Preservation and Cost Savings Act
Community Postal Service Preservation and Cost Savings Act
To authorize the United States Postal Service to co-locate post offices at retail facilities and municipal buildings, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Community Postal Service Preservation and Cost Savings Act - Requires the U.S. Postal Service (USPS), in considering whether to close or consolidate a post office, to review and consider whether such post office can be co-located at a retail facility or municipal building within one mile of such post office.
